getImageIcon

public static javax.swing.ImageIcon getImageIcon(java.lang.String path,
                                                 int width,
                                                 int height)
it gets a string which is is a path to a specific image. and returns an image icon with that image and passed dimension

Parameters:
path - path to the image file
width - required width of the ImageIcon
height - required height of the ImageIcon
Returns:
new Image Icon created
